snippet: Kevin Johnson, a former Suns player and the mayor of Sacramento, is leading the search for an executive director for the N.B.A.’s players union, which has been without one since February 2013.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column; Kevin Johnson, a former Phoenix Suns player and currently second-term mayor of Sacramento, is leading the search for an executive director for the NBA players union, which has been without one since February 2013; he has assembled a seven-person committee of business and sports executives to conduct the search.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Johnson, a former Suns player and the mayor of Sacramento, is leading the search for an executive director for the N.B.A.’s players union, which has been without one since February 2013.

headline.main: N.B.A. Players Reset Union Search With Kevin Johnson as Point Man
headline.print_headline: From Point Guard to Point Man in Union Search
